Extensions/UIDevice.html#/c:@CM@Extensio.name: fullModel
Extensions/UIDevice.html#/c:@CM@Extensio.abstract: The full name of the device model. Examples: iPhone SE, iPad Air 2.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: create(fromString:format:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Creates a date from a string with specified date format.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: string(format:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Returns a string that represents a date in a specific format.

Extensions/Calendar.html#/s:10Foundation.name: firstDay(of:for:)
Extensions/Calendar.html#/s:10Foundation.abstract: Returns the first day of a given calendar unit (year, quarter, month or week) that contains a given date.

Extensions/Calendar.html#/s:10Foundation.name: lastDay(of:for:)
Extensions/Calendar.html#/s:10Foundation.abstract: Returns the last day of a given calendar unit (year, quarter, month or week) that contains a given date.

Extensions/Calendar.html#/s:10Foundation.name: datesBetween(_:and:withStep:value:)
Extensions/Calendar.html#/s:10Foundation.abstract: Returns an array of dates in the interval with the specified step value.

Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd10Extensions.name: truncate(toDecimalPlaces:)
Extensions/Double.html#/s:Sd10Extensions.abstract: Truncates the number up to nth decimal places.

Extensions/Calendar.html.name: Calendar
Extensions/Calendar.html.abstract: The NSCalendar extension for getting the first/last day.
